title: Morning Hydration
description: Drink at least 500ml of water immediately after waking up to kickstart metabolism.

title: Healthy Breakfast
description: Eat a protein-rich breakfast like eggs or Greek yogurt with berries.

title: Meal Tracking
description: Log all meals and snacks in a food tracking app to monitor caloric intake.

title: Afternoon Fruit Snack
description: Replace processed sugary snacks with an apple or a handful of nuts.

title: Limit Evening Caffeine
description: Avoid coffee or tea after 4:00 PM to ensure better sleep quality.

title: Daily Vegetable Goal
description: Incorporate at least two servings of green vegetables into lunch and dinner.
